sense.def:
Z besedo
nonsense
označujemo besede, ki ne pomenijo ničesar.

seg.quote: You can confuse the computer program by typing in nonsense.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da je nekaj povedanega ali napisanega
nonsense
, pomeni, da je po našem mnenju tisto neresnično ali neumno.

seg.quote: A lot of nonsense is talked about the temperature of wine.
Stop this nonsense, Louisa, for God's sake.
‘I am her father.’—‘Nonsense,’ he said. ‘You are not.’

sense.def:
To make nonsense of something
pomeni tisto prikazati kot smešno ali neustrezno.

cit.quote: vzeti smisel, izničiti; biti v protislovju

seg.quote: The rest of his policies made nonsense of his call for moderation.
